testcase.classname: Logged-in user adds products to the cart
testcase.name: Logged-in user can add video games to the cart
testcase.system-out: When clicks on All menu.....................................................passed And clicks on video games...................................................passed And clicks all video games list item........................................passed Then user is surfing Video Games webpage....................................passed When clicks on free shipping checkbox.......................................passed And clicks on New condition.................................................passed And sorts the products by price from high to low............................passed And adds any product to cart that its cost below 15k EGP....................passed When clicks on cart.........................................................passed Then all products are there with their subtotal correctly calculated........passed Given User clicks on proceed to purchase and be redirected to login page....passed When logs-in using username "fihones827@mahmul.com" and password "12345678".passed Then user is redirected to shipping address details.........................passed When inserts full-name "John Doe" and mobile-number "1113599511"............passed And inserts street-name "talaat harb" and building-number "8"...............passed And inserts City as "Cairo".................................................passed And inserts district as "1 1st Settlement"..................................passed And adds "Cairo-Festival" landmark to the address...........................passed And chooses address-type as Home............................................passed And confirm Adding the address to the delivery-shipment.....................passed Then check order total amount...............................................passed
